verbs.description: foreconsider (third-person singular simple present foreconsiders, present participle foreconsidering, simple past and past participle foreconsidered)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To consider beforehand; think about in advance.
examples: Correspondingly, it is reasonable to expect beneficial results from a further elaboration of the foreconsidered nonlinear approach, in particularly, the joint integral analysis and the use of concepts of self-organization, information, adaptation [...]
